resource.description: Locator ID for the material textures. i.e: `layers/0/nodes/{material.resource}/textures/{tex_name}`. **required** if material declares any textures

texelCountHint.description: Estimated number of texel for the highest resolution base color texture. i.e. `texture.mip0.width*texture.mip0.height`. Useful to estimate the resource cost of this node and/or texel-resolution based LOD switching. Ignored for un-textured meshes

examples.title: Texture material
examples.description: Texture(s) will be at `layers/0/nodes/6/textures/{tex_name}`. `tex_name` is from the 5th material definition. For example, the base color texture set would be `layer.materialDefinition[4].pbrMetallicRoughness.baseColorTexture.textureSetDefinitionId`
